episodesJson.title: SHORTS - Jackplot
episodesJson.description: This week, we watched the 2020 British short film Jackplot. For a movie with the word plot in the title, there's not a lot of it, so mostly we just talked about a DC/Frasier crossover. Join us, won't you?
topics: How much money would it take for you to kill your husband?
What if it was in British money?
What even is British money? How does it work?
